body.p: The Substance of the evidence in the trial as detailed before the Fulton Circuit Court at its last September Term -- Cole & Finch were engaged in a quarrel Cole pulled Finches wiskers -- Finch left the House in which they were in -- Cole Followed Finch out & walked up to where Finch was & said he would cut Finches throat -- & put his hand in his pocket -- Finch remarked that if Shoot is your game here goes & drew his pistol & fired & Struck Cole about the groins Cole fell saying he was shot -- Both parties were considerably under the influence of Liquor -- this transaction took place in the City of Hickman on Christmas eve about 2 years Since both parties at the time citizens of Ky.
